ygData.subject: Patching Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, since Sony cant help me.. I am looking for a kind soul that has extra time, and willing to aid fellow adventurers. I have problem patching the huge
ygData.messageBody:
Well, since Sony cant help me.. I am looking for a kind soul that
has extra time, and willing to aid fellow adventurers.

I have problem patching the huge files.. mainly eqgame.exe
eqfeartintro.pak nedaria.s3d etc etc

I mean, using eq own default patch program, those files took ages..
and if I somehow manage to get the files I needed posted on a
website.. it will help me a lot.

I had to quit 3 years ago, when Warrens and Stoneburnt (those
optional download zones) came out and I cant download it..

A friend used to help me by sending emails containing particular big
files (over 1mb gives me problems, as my isp somehow limit/time my
d/l if it took too long/over 1mb files) and somehow I manage to
finished patching.

I am not on a 56k modem, but using a CDMA phone connection that
supposedly have 260k speed (but honestly the max I ever got was 80k,
twice the speed of dial up).. and if I dont use software like
download accelerator, then files will be downloaded at such a
horrible speed that 1mb will took 10 hours, but if using those 3rd
party software to somehow "trick" my isp insane firewall.. then I
can easily d/l 4mb-10mb per hour.

So.. what I am asking for help is.. please, could anybody be as so
kind as to post/upload to a free website the eqfeartintros.pak which
server shows as 1377409 big and ldonequip.s3d server 1133942. I have
many more files I had not manage to d/l. But once I manage to d/l
these 2 files, 3mb big which will take me upmost of 2 hours with d/l
express (best booster soft!).. then I will update these kind folks,
thanks.

I apologise if im hard to understand.. yep, im in my confused and
weakened state as it has taken me 3days of phonecalls, browsing net
to find solution (mess with MTU, ping, tracert, sent sony countless
patch server date, and it somehows shows sonyonline.net should share
the problems too).. so sorry and please accept my thanks if anyone
can help. Thank You (I would gladly pass a Velious keycode)
